name: mm-rating
description: A re-usable rating component for rating a product or different things.

attributes.name: customIcon
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-rating to set custom icon provided by user

attributes.name: iconWidth
attributes.description: Sets the width of the icon.

attributes.name: iconHeight
attributes.description: Sets the height of the icon

attributes.name: rating
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-rating to set the number of rating. Default rating is 0.

attributes.name: displayTotals
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-rating to show total number of ratings or not.

attributes.name: displayGreetings
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-rating to show greetings for each rating or not.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-rating that the user can give rating or not. This behavior can be enabled by setting the value of readonly to true

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: The data array object provided to the mm-rating. The data array object should contain objects name/key and current value for each rate in the mm-rating. Can be provided to the mm-rating if initial values are necessary

methods.name: isCustomIcon
methods.description: Instructs the mm-rating to set custom icon or not.

methods.name: calculateRating
methods.description: First of all it checks that the readonly is set or not if set then it does not allow user to rate but if readonly is not set then it calculate the number of ratings and according to that it sets the style, greeting, and total number of rating.

methods.name: _overHandler
methods.description: It sets the style, greetings and total number of rating on the hover effect.

methods.name: _outHandler
methods.description: It removes the style and greetings of rating on the un-hover effect.
